title: Dacor Discovery 36" Stainless Fully Integrated Bottom Freezer Refrigerator DYF36BFTSR - Overview
description:
Dacor Discovery 36 Stainless Steel Fully Integrated Bottom Freezer Refrigerator - DYF36BFTSR
http://www.abt.com/product/93205/Dacor-Discovery-36-Stainless-Steel-Fully-Integrated-Bottom-Freezer-Refrigerator-DYF36BFTSR.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=DYF36BFTSSRH_20160411

Your passion for cooking just got a brand new partner with the Dacor Discovery 36 and 30 Fully Integrated Refrigerators.
Crisper fruits and vegetables fresher meats fish and daily - key ingredients for your culinary success - are achieved through Dacors careful attention to humidity and temperature control.
In addition youll enjoy our stylish LED lighting convenient touch display and easily adjustable shelves and door racks.
Equally brilliant is the patented FlushFit™ hinge system. This proprietary hinging ensures balanced door movement and stability and allows the doors to articulate freely away from the adjacent cabinetry or wall for a true flush installation.
Dacors Discovery Fully Integrated Refrigerators - Culinary companions that recognize the best meals are a product of your cooking artistry and the quality and freshness of your ingredients.
Features:
• FlushFit™ allows for seamless built-in appearance.
• Dual Variable Speed Compressor/Dual Evaporator Cooling System maintains optimal temperature and humidity for each zone while using less energy.
• SoftShut™ Drawers quietly pulls drawers closed with ease.
• FreshZone Freezer Compartment converts from Freezer temperature to either Refrigerator or Fresh compartment cooling providing extra fresh food storage space.
• White Metal Interior is easy to clean enhances interior lighting and resists odors.
• Glass Touch Control Panel with blue LED lights makes viewing and adjusting settings clear and simple.
• GlideShelf™ provides easy shelf and bin repositioning.
• BeadBlast™ finish on stainless shelves and handles prevents fingerprints and scratching.
• Standard Features Include:
o Alarms
o Max Cool
o Fast Ice
o Adjustable Ice Cube Size
o Beverage Cooler
o Sabbath Mode
o Ice Filter Notification
